content: आराध् {c5c} {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To propitiate, conciliate, please, try to win the favour of; परेषां चेतांसि प्रतिदिवसमाराध्य बहुधा <ls>Bh. 3. 34</ls>, <ls n="Bh.">2. 4-5</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 77</ls>, <ls n="R. 1.">81</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 86</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 23</ls>; <ls>Me. 45.</ls> {@--2@} To honour, worship, respect. {@--3@} To deserve, merit.
